name: Aaron's Lovely Morning
description:
Description

Godot game developed by Moowool as a gift for Aaron Franke using his custom Node1D nodes.

How to Play

Press 1 to eat tacos, 2 to eat pizzas, and 3 to eat burritos. If you eat the wrong food 3 times, you lose.

Link to source.

Credits
  • Aaron Art: LCSkeleton
  • Chimes Music: bmccoy2
  • Damaged Sound: Kenney
  • Healing Sound: SilverIllusionist
  • Eating Sound: Koops
  • Food Art: ghostpixxells
  • Mountain Art: Vicente Nitti
  • Pulse Sound: colorsCrimsonTears, FlechaBr, InspectorJ
